Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is red-grey in section, the exterior, with one band of multiple grooves, is covered with a light-brown slip and faint traces of one line of red-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394201) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394201)
